title: How to Mesmerize Someone in Fallout 3

steps.headline: Go to Paradise Falls.
steps.description: Talk to Grouse at the entrance.

steps.headline: He will offer you a quest.
steps.description: Accept it. He will give you the Mesmetron.

steps.headline: Take out the Mesmetron and crouch until you are hidden.
steps.description: Using V.A.T.S., lock onto a person's head.

steps.headline: Fire.
steps.description: It will either stun them, make them aggressive, or blow their heads up. It usually stuns them.

steps.headline: Talk to the mesmerized person.
steps.description: They will allow you to pillage their inventory. If you so choose, place a slave collar on them and send them back to Paradise Falls.

text: Go to Paradise Falls. Talk to Grouse at the entrance. He will offer you a quest. Accept it. He will give you the Mesmetron. Take out the Mesmetron and crouch until you are hidden. Using V.A.T.S., lock onto a person's head. Fire. It will either stun them, make them aggressive, or blow their heads up. It usually stuns them. Talk to the mesmerized person. They will allow you to pillage their inventory. If you so choose, place a slave collar on them and send them back to Paradise Falls.
